thumb.description: ãƒœã‚«ãƒ­ãƒªãƒ¡ã‚¤ã‚¯æŠ•ç¨¿ç¥­2025æ˜¥ æŠ•ç¨¿æ›²HXVOC Vocal ver.music/lyric/mix by Fryingpan ( https://twitter.com/pan_of_the_fry )ã€lyricsã€‘A ritual to receive God's protectionBy killing, you get recognized by Godbring down the hammer on the unbelievers"I'm God's messenger."A sacred killing to show loyalty to GodDon't worry, you're just heading to GodWill the God we reach at the end of death bless us?The god I was taught to believe in, is he actually real?People who got cocky, thinking they were God's spokespersonsBlind faith can end up burning even sacred placesWithout realizing it was black propagandaA fake holy warIs it God's fault or human's fault that things are distorted?Why even fight in a world without god?Where is the god you believe in?
